title: Public opinions on gay marriage in Italy 2016
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
Response Against has the highest Share of respondents and I don´t know has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 44.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Against and lowest at Response I don´t know.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
Response Against has the highest Share of respondents and I don´t know has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 44.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 52.0 is found at Response Against and the minimum is found at I don´t know where Response is 8.0.
The highest Response Against has 44.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response I don´t know.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 3 Responses is roughly 33.33.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
